description:
For anyone who refuses to cook on electric stoves because they don't heat up or cool down fast enough, for the love of god take a look at an induction burner. I'll give you one for free* if you can teach me how magnets work.

Full video on our channel (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hX2aZUav-54)
And don’t forget to check out our friends over at  @HotAndToxic    - and you can learn all about the toxins in natural gas here: https://hotandtoxic.com/#facts 

*Not really. Very sorry about that.
title: The Gas Stove Killer
